text.text: Some of the App Features We Can't Stay Silent About
Define exactly the geographical coverage area of each of your stores and list a different portfolio in each.
Create Promotions on the products you want,and provide users with promo codes to push your sales and get more returning users.
Make sure your app can find exactly what they're looking by using the search bar and its smart algorithm
Keep your users updated about their order status via notifications
Allow your users to pick their preferred language when using the app
Pickers can inform the users about any out of stock items and propose replacements via the app
